Alright guys,
So welcome to day two of the North Korea trip.

The leaders had to be fully framed. I think this was just to show how big the statues are.
They're 22 meters tall each the statues were completed in 2012
So they're reasonably new to both sides of the statues. There are
229 figures representing the struggle that the Korean people went through during the war underneath you can see

divided into categories by number plate.

number plates belong to a company. Black is military. Green is something to do with the government. I think? Super interesting
